Member Function Documentation

◆ getEnthalpyVirginMaterial()

double getEnthalpyVirginMaterial ( ) const
inlinevirtual

Returns the enthalpy of the virgin material equal to the one set in the gsi input file.

If it is unset this value defaults to 0.

Reimplemented from SolidProperties.

Definition at line 80 of file SolidPropertiesSteadyState.cpp.

◆ getPhiRatio()

double getPhiRatio ( ) const
inlinevirtual

Returns parameter phi defined as the ration between the virgin material density and the surface density minus 1.

It is need for the steady state conduction and pyrolysis cases. If it is undefined its value is aytomatically set equal to one.

Reimplemented from SolidProperties.
